mapper.select: select * from tblcomment c inner join tblorder o on c.orderid = o.orderid inner join tblshop s on s.shopid = o.shopid where commentcontent is null and userid = #{userid} and o.orderstate = 32

select * from tblcomment c inner join tblorder o on o.orderid = c.orderid inner join tblbuygoods bg on bg.orderid = o.orderid inner join tblgoods g on g.goodsid = bg.goodsid where c.userid = #{userid} and c.commentcontent is null and c.orderid = #{orderid} and o.orderstate = 32

select * from tblcomment c inner join tblorder o on o.orderid = c.orderid inner join tblshop s on s.shopid = c.shopid where c.commentcontent is not null and c.userid = #{userid} and c.roleid = #{roleid}
